title: Mash the Potatoes
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 42 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 120L
description: What kind of food do you love? Mash the Potatoes tells about the foods that one family loves to eat, as well as the steps required to mash potatoes. Students have the opportunity to sequence events and connect to prior knowledge. Detailed, supportive illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early-emergent readers.
meta: boil, count, eat, mash, peels, potatoes
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize, use, and write the high-frequency word we

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
